thread.title: Everything about this insane Texas lawyer ad is brilliant
thread.title_full: Everything about this insane Texas lawyer ad is brilliant - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Everything about this insane Texas lawyer ad is brilliant
text:
Lawyers on airwaves. Lawyers on billboards. There’s an overwhelming number of law offices in Texas that promise to get you out of trouble. You should take your time, listen to friends’ recommendations and … oh, screw it, just go with this guy.
Meet the Texas Law Hawk – Bryan Wilson. He can do a wheelie on a mini-bike. He says he can get defendants off the hook.
Wilson, a Fort Worth-based criminal trial lawyer, has taken the “love me or hate me” approach to marketing. His very Texas ads feature screaming hawk noises, angry cops and Lucha Libre masks.
Photo: YouTube Image 1 of / 12 12 Some of the best scenes from Bryan "Law Hawk" Wilson's insane YouTube spots. His latest ad has received more 300,000 views. Watch it here. Photo: YouTube Image 12 of 12 Everything about this insane Texas lawyer ad is brilliant 1 / 12 Back to Gallery The YouTube clips are deafening, over-the-top and intense. Wilson, a 29-year-old graduate of Texas Tech University, said the obnoxious advertisement has paid off. He told a local CBS affiliate in East Texas that he’s received hundreds of calls and voicemails about the ad since debuting the spot Tuesday.
In the past, he’s released similar commercials that are (slightly) calmer than his latest iteration. The latest spot for the Law Hawk – a nickname he earned in college – has more than 369,000 views as of Thursday afternoon.
